pages.text: A $(9)Potion Charm$() is a brand new item that helps you get the most out of your potions.$(p)See, while a normal potion requires you to drink it and use the whole effect at once, the $(9)Potion Charm$() lets you stagger it.

pages.title: Potion Charm Crafting
pages.text: A charm is made out of three potions of the same type, and some blaze powder.$(p)A single charm lasts longer than the three potions combined.

pages.title: Using Potion Charms
pages.text: A $(9)Potion Charm$() is only active when it is enabled.$(p)To enable a charm, simply right click with it in-hand.$(p)An enabled charm will start glowing.

As long as the charm is active and in your inventory, it will apply the potion to you, consuming durability.$(p)The charm will only apply a couple seconds of potion at a time.$(p)When the charm runs out of durability, it will break.
